message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $11,500.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,800. Can you consider this offer?
